value.query: SELECT Id,Account.Name,%vlocity_namespace%__LineNumber__c,	%vlocity_namespace%__ProvisioningStatus__c,LastModifiedDate,Product2.Name,Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__Type__c,Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__JSONAttribute__c,Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__SubType__c, Product2.Family ,%vlocity_namespace%__BillingAccountId__r.Name,Name, Price,SerialNumber, Product_Family__c,Product_Family_Image__c, PurchaseDate,InstallDate,Status,Mobile_Number__c, %vlocity_namespace%__RecurringTotal__c,Description FROM Asset WHERE %vlocity_namespace%__LineNumber__c LIKE  '{{params.LineNumber}}.%' AND AccountId = '{{params.id}}'
